name: text_area
docstring: The input part of a TextArea, may be used by itself.

properties.name: resize
properties.docstring: The resize behavior of the text area: "none" | "vertical" | "horizontal" | "both"

properties.name: auto_complete
properties.docstring: Whether the form control should have autocomplete enabled

properties.name: auto_focus
properties.docstring: Automatically focuses the textarea when the page loads

properties.name: default_value
properties.docstring: The default value of the textarea when initially rendered

properties.name: dirname
properties.docstring: Name part of the textarea to submit in 'dir' and 'name' pair when form is submitted

properties.name: form
properties.docstring: Associates the textarea with a form (by id)

properties.name: max_length
properties.docstring: Maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea

properties.name: min_length
properties.docstring: Minimum number of characters required in the textarea

properties.name: name
properties.docstring: Name of the textarea, used when submitting the form

properties.name: read_only
properties.docstring: Indicates whether the textarea is read-only

properties.name: required
properties.docstring: Indicates that the textarea is required

properties.name: rows
properties.docstring: Visible number of lines in the text control

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The controlled value of the textarea, read only unless used with on_change

properties.name: wrap
properties.docstring: How the text in the textarea is to be wrapped when submitting the form

styling_props.name: size
styling_props.docstring: The size of the text area: "1" | "2" | "3"

styling_props.name: variant
styling_props.docstring: The variant of the text area

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.docstring: The color of the text area

styling_props.name: radius
styling_props.docstring: The radius of the text area: "none" | "small" | "medium" | "large" | "full"
